summary: haptoglobin-hemoglobin complex inhibits the peroxidase-like activity of luminol/H2O2-hemoglobin-MNPs sensing scheme. the resulting haptoglobin-hemoglobin complex inhibits the peroxidase-like activity of hemoglobin-modified MNPs sensing scheme. supplementary information 12951_2019_569_MOESM1_ESM.docx (1.4MB, docx) Additional file 1: Table S1. Peak area comparison of amide bonds vs. Fe–O for the different MNPs modifications obtained by ATR-FTIR.
